dataset_name.description: Name of the final table where to replicate this file (should include only letters, numbers dash and underscores)

format.description: File Format of the file to be replicated (Warning: some format may be experimental, please refer to docs).

url.description: URL path to access the file to be replicated

params.description: list with json params to be replaced in the url. See more https://github.com/tradersclub/airbyte/blob/master/ABALUSTRE_CONNECTORS.md

provider.description: Storage Provider or Location of the file(s) to be replicated.

service_account_json.description: In order to access private Buckets stored on Google Cloud, this connector would need a service account json credentials with the proper permissions as described here. Please generate the credentials.json file and copy/paste its content to this field (expecting JSON formats). If accessing publicly available data, this field is not necessary.
